Comment: Abilities: A038 (Cavalry Onslaught), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Calls upon waves of brave knights to charge into enemy ranks. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r -  Each charging Knight deals 40 damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r -  Each charging Knight deals 70 damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r -  Each charging Knight deals 100 damage. |n|nLasts 30 seconds.
